boba

Documentation

Learn how to build a website with boba, today!

Buttons

Buttons come in all colors

<button class="green"> Green </button>

Sizes

Buttons can be resized
<button class="small"> Small </button>
<button class="default"> Default </button>
<button class="medium"> Medium </button>
<button class="large"> Large </button>

Styles

Change the look of your buttons with ease

Rounded

Buttons can be pill-shaped

<button class="green rounded"> Green </button>

Inverted

The color of your button will appear on hover or click

<button class="green inverted"> Green </button>

Outlined

Your buttons will be colored outlines

<button class="green outlined"> Green </button>

Combinations

Use .rounded with either .inverted or .outlined to create the perfect button
<button class="red rounded inverted"> Red </button>
<button class="green rounded outlined"> Green </button>

States

Buttons can be disabled
<button disabled> Disabled </button>

Classes

Links and inputs can be buttons as well
Link Button 
<button> Default Button </button>
<a class="button"> Link Button </a>
<input type="button"value="Input Button">
